sentence:
• Salesforce.com (NYSE: CRM ) soared 9% to $143.64 after its earnings came in above expectations
• Following an announcement that Chairman of Kenneth Cole Productions (NYSE: KCP ) would be taking the company private, shares of the company jumped 18.5% to $15.49
• Shares of Wellcare Healthcare Plans (NYSE: WCG ) soared 5.9% to $71.10 following the removal of a major hurdle to a legal settlement
• Shares of Crocs Inc. (Nasdaq: CROX ) plunged 5% after it posted first quarter earnings which surpassed expectations late on Thursday
